SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountInfoDatabase
The AccountInfoDatabase class handles the login of the Hospital Management System.
Administrator
The Administrator class represents an administrator entity, which extends the BasePerson class.
AdminUI
AdminUI class represents the user interface for admin-related functionalities.
Appointment
A class that stores the information of an appointment When created, it stores the timing and people involved in the appointment When completed, it additionally stores the prescription and outcome of the appointment
AppointmentList
A class that stores the Appointment in a LinkedList structure
APT_STATUS
Enumeration for appointment status
BasePerson
The BasePerson class represents a basic person entity with attributes such as ID, name, date of birth (DOB), gender, and role.
BaseUI
A Base Interface to keep the default Variables and Methods a User Interface should have
Contact
The Contact class represents a patient's contact information, including an email address and a contact number.
ContactChecker
The ContactChecker class provides utility methods for validating contact information, such as email addresses and Singapore phone numbers.
DataEncryption
A Class to encrypt and decrypt datas
DataSerialisation
A class for converting between String and Objects
Doctor
The Doctor class represents a doctor in the system, with functionality for managing appointments, availability, and schedules.
DoctorUI
DoctorUI class represents the user interface for doctor-related functionalities.
Input
The Input class deals with the clearing and obtaining of inputs from the terminal
Main
 
MED_STATUS
Enumeration for medicine status
MedicineData
The MedicineData class represents data about a medicine in a pharmacy system.
MedicineRequest
The MedicineRequest class represents a request for medicine in a pharmacy system.
Patient
Represents a patient in a hospital management system, storing personal details, medical history, and appointment records.
PatientUI
The PatientUI class provides a command-line user interface for patients to manage personal information, appointments, and medical records.
Pharmacist
A class that stores the details of a Pharmacist
PharmacistUI
This PharmacistUI Class provides a Command-Line Interface for the Pharmacist user.
Pharmacy
The Pharmacy class manages the medicine stock for the Hospital Management System
Prescription
A class to store the prescription of medicine
PrescriptionList
A linked list of prescription that stores in ascending order
RestockRequest
The RestockRequest class represents a request for restocking medicines in a pharmacy system.
ROLE
Enumeration for user role
ServerHMS
A Singleton Class to ensure that only one instance of AccountInfoDatabase, UserInfoDatabase and Pharmacy is present.
UICreator
A class used to initialise a BaseUI with the given BasePerson object
UserInfoDatabase
The UserInfoDatabase class manages the user's information for the Hospital Management System
